attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the british public fill that it is time for change the prime minister was not put there by the british public but by his own party members. and now the same members of his on party would like to see im stand down so this petition is for a general election soon as posible.time to let the public have there say

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
